step1.button: What you need to know about your SEED
step1.p1: Please take some time to understand some important things for your own safety. üôè
step1.p2: We cannot recover your funds or freeze your account if you visit a phishing site or lose your backup phrase (aka SEED phrase).
step1.p3: By continuing to use our platform, you agree to accept all risks associated with the loss of your SEED, including but not limited to the inability to obtain your funds and dispose of them. In case you lose your SEED, you agree and acknowledge that the Waves Platform would not be responsible for the negative consequences of this.
step1.title: Welcome to the Waves Platform!

step2.cell1: You use your wallet anonymously, meaning your account is not connected to an email account or any other identifying data.
step2.cell2: Your password protects your account when working on a certain device or browser. It is needed in order to ensure that your secret phrase is not saved in storage.
step2.cell3: If you forget your password, you can easily create a new one by using the account recovery form via your secret phrase. If you lose your secret phrase, however, you will have no way to access your account.
step2.cell4: You cannot change your secret phrase. If you accidentally sent it to someone or suspect that scammers have taken it over, then create a new Waves wallet immediately and transfer your funds to it.
step2.p1: When registering your account, you will be asked to save your secret phrase (SEED) and to protect your account with a password. On normal centralized servers, special attention is paid to the password, which can be changed and reset via email, if the need arises. However, on decentralized platforms such as Waves, everything is arranged differently:
step2.title: What you need to know about your SEED

step3.cell2: Do not use browsers that have extensions or plugins to access your account.
step3.cell3: Do not open emails or links from unknown senders.
step3.cell4Web: Regularly update your browser and operating system.
step3.cell5: Use official security software. Do not install unknown software which could be hacked.
step3.cell6: Do not access your wallet when using public Wi-Fi or someone else‚Äôs device.
step3.p1: One of the most common forms of scamming is phishing, which is when scammers create fake communities on Facebook or other websites that look similar to the authentic ones.
step3.title: How To Protect Yourself from Phishers

backup.body: Store your SEED safely, it is the only way to restore your wallet.
backup.title: Save your backup phrase (SEED)

body.1_0_0: {span.line}[1. The Waves Client has come out of beta.]{span.line}[2. You can now pin and unpin any assets to the main page.]{span.line}[3. Night mode added.]{span.line}[4. You can now import all your accounts from the old Client easily.]{span.line}[5. Minor bug fixes.]
body.1_0_0-beta_23: {span.line}[1. We have added a 'What's new' section!]{span.line}[2. You can now add a name to your account.]{span.line}[3. Some minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_25: {span.line}[1. You can now change session time in Settings.]{span.line}[2. We have fixed the bug with the Buy/Sell window in DEX to prevent it being moved outside the viewing area.]{span.line}[3. We will now remind you if you have not saved your SEED.]{span.line}[4. Some minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_26: {span.line}[1. Some minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_27: {span.line}[1. Added Chinese language.]{span.line}[2. Added Turkish language.]
body.1_0_0-beta_30: {span.line}[1. You can now burn and reissue tokens you have generated.]{span.line}[2. Added the Waves Auth API support.]{span.line}[3. Some minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_31: {span.line}[1. You can now buy WAVES and BTC with a credit card.]{span.line}[2. Improved UI in the Buy/Sell window.]{span.line}[3. Support for 32-bit Windows added.]{span.line}[4. Numerous other bugs fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_32: {span.line}[1. You can now make mass transfers from the Client.]{span.line}[2. Some minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_35: {span.line}[1. You can now sort, filter and hide tokens in the Portfolio tab.]{span.line}[2. DASH gateway has been launched.]{span.line}[3. Hindi language support added.]{span.line}[4. Dutch language support added.]{span.line}[5. You can now invoice other users.]{span.line}[6. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_36: {span.line}[1. Major leasing nodes are listed on the leasing page.]{span.line}[2. Some bugs are fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_39: {span.line}[1. A spam filter has been added to Settings.]{span.line}[2. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_42: {span.line}[1. Spanish language support added.]{span.line}[2. You can use the Client without saving account details by default.]{span.line}[3. Spam tokens are now marked in the Transaction page.]{span.line}[4. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_0-beta_47: {span.line}[1. Completely new DEX UI.]{span.line}[2. Faster and more stable Client.]{span.line}[3. Alias functionality is available again.]{span.line}[4. Some minor bugs have been fixed.]{span.line}[5. Take part in our competitions by making a [video](https://forum.wavesplatform.com/t/contest-best-waves-dex-video-review/822) or writing an [article](https://forum.wavesplatform.com/t/contest-for-the-writers-waves-dex-overview/835).]
body.1_0_0-beta_50: {span.line}[1. You can now burn any tokens you hold in your account.]{span.line}[2. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_10:
{span.line}[1. Sponsorship transaction support added. [Read more](https://docs.wavesplatform.com/en/waves-client/assets-management/sponsored-transaction.html)]
{span.line}[2. Polish and Portuguese languages support added.]
body.1_0_14:
{span.line}[1. Fixed bug with using Sponsored Asset without Waves balance.]
{span.line}[2. Fixed bug with 30 days expiration orders.]
{span.line}[3. Some other minor bugs.]
body.1_0_15:
{span.line}[1. Issues with confirmation on Ledger have been fixed.]
{span.line}[2. Increased waiting time for confirmation from Ledger.]
{span.line}[3. Detailed information has been added to Error messages.]
body.1_0_18:
{span.line}[1. You can now set a script for your account.]
{span.line}[2. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_21:
{span.line}[1. Fixed authorisation confirmation via Ledger.]
{span.line}[2. Numerous minor bugs fixed.]
body.1_0_22: {span.line}[1. Added advanced features to work with scripted accounts.]
body.1_0_27:
{span.line}[1. Added "My assets" category in Portfolio.]
{span.line}[2. Minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_28:
{span.line}[1. Added pairing function to import existing accounts to mobile.]
{span.line}[2. Minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_29:
{span.line}[1. QR code generation using Cyrillic alphabet has been fixed.]
{span.line}[2. Tooltip for watchlist search has been added.]
{span.line}[3. Further cosmetic fixes. ]
body.1_0_3:
{span.line}[1. You can now search assets by ID in the Portfolio page.]
{span.line}[2. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_30:
{span.line}[1. Set Script button has been moved to Security section in Settings.]
{span.line}[2. Performance improvements and cosmetic changes.]
body.1_0_32:
{span.line}[1. Integration with BetterTokens‚Äô oracle.]
{span.line}[2. Added support for token verification protocol.]
{span.line}[3. Fixed commission accounting for token withdrawal via Coinomat.]
body.1_0_33: {span.line} [1. Now you will receive a notification if you try to place an order at a rate significantly differing from the current market rate.] {span.line} [2. Minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_36:
{span.line}[1. Added ability to trade on DEX with scripted accounts.]
{span.line}[2. Added search for assets when creating an invoice or sending an asset.]
{span.line}[3. Minor layout edits.]
body.1_0_37:
{span.line}[1. Added Smart Asset functionality: issuance, reissuance and burning]
{span.line}[2. Added Italian, German and Indonesian languages]
{span.line}[3. Minor bug fixes]
body.1_0_40:
{span.line}[1. DEX optimisation.]
{span.line}[2. Added exchange rate for current pair in browser tab title.]
{span.line}[3. Fixed minor bugs.]
body.1_0_41:
{span.line}[1. DEX optimisation.]
{span.line}[2. Notification system added.]
{span.line}[3. Fixed minor bugs.]
body.1_0_5:
{span.line}[1. Trade volume scale has been added on DEX charts.]
{span.line}[2. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_0_6: {span.line}[1. Authorisation via Waves Desktop Client has been added.]
body.1_0_7:
{span.line}[1. Some desktop-client crashes were fixed.]
{span.line}[2. Optimized switching between TX and Portfolio pages, with a big amount of content.]
{span.line}[3. Spam-tokens names are hidden on TX list.]
{span.line}[4. Error messages output has been reworked.]
body.1_0_8:
{span.line}[1. Ledger Nano S support has been added.]
{span.line}[2. A new option for saving your choice of Authorisation method has been added.]
body.1_1_0:
{span.line}[1. Order expiration period is now saved by default.]
{span.line}[2. Fixed minor bugs.]
body.1_2_0:
{span.line}[1. Added Japanese and Estonian languages.]
{span.line}[2. Improved UI in the Buy/Sell window.]
{span.line}[3. Numerous minor bugs fixed.]
body.1_2_1:
{span.line}[1. The application now saves the chart size and scale settings as well as the time interval.]
{span.line}[2. Fixed minor bugs.]
body.1_2_3: {span.line}[1. Added support for Ledger Waves 1.0.0 app.]
body.1_2_6:
{span.line}[1. Invocation script transaction support added. [Read more](https://blog.wavesplatform.com/ride-for-dapps-hits-waves-testnet-e3f2906dd2aa)]
{span.line}[2. Improved UI and additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_2_8:
{span.line}[1. Spam tokens and transactions have been hidden in client.]
{span.line}[2. Improved UI and additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_3_0: {span.line}[1. Improved app navigation and start page interface.]
body.1_3_18:
{span.line}[1. Added login to wallet using a private key.]
{span.line}[2. The 24 hours price change of a token is now bound to token/WAVES pair.]
body.1_3_19:
{span.line}[1. Bancor gateway has been launched.]
{span.line}[2. User menu interface has been improved.]
body.1_3_2:
{span.line}[1. Vostok gateway has been launched.]
{span.line}[2. Improved UI and additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_3_20:
{span.line}[1. Improved system for storing and restoring accounts from local storage (Need to update the [desktop application](https://wavesplatform.com/technology/wallet)).]
{span.line}[2. Fixed rounding of prices in the orderbook.]
body.1_3_5:
{span.line}[1. A tab with [wsoc.io](https://wsoc.io) contest tokens has been added.]
{span.line}[2. French language support added.]
{span.line}[3. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_3_7:
{span.line}[1. Integration with [tokenrating.wavesexplorer.com](https://tokenrating.wavesexplorer.com) Now you can rate tokens directly in the app.]
{span.line}[2. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
body.1_3_9:
{span.line}[1. Improved UI and functionality of Exchange and Wallet sections.]
{span.line}[2. Additional minor bugs have been fixed.]
